sqlMap.statement:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO , T02.USERID , T02.USERNAME , T02.DEPTNAME , T02.POSITIONNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM02 T02
UPPER(USERID) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#searchUserId#)||'%'
UPPER(USERNAME) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#searchUserName#)||'%'
) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM02 T02
UPPER(USERID) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#searchUserId#)||'%'
UPPER(USERNAME) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#searchUserName#)||'%'

SELECT T02.USERID, T02.USERNAME, T02.PASSWORD, T02.BRANCHCODE, T02.MOBILE , T02.PHONE, T02.EMAIL, T02.POSITIONNAME, T02.DEPTNAME, T02.USEYN , T02.CREATEBY, T02.UPDATEBY, T02.CREATEON, T02.UPDATEON FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM02 T02 WHERE USERID = #userId#

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIRM02 SET USERNAME = #userName# , BRANCHCODE = #branchCode# , MOBILE = #mobile# , PHONE = #phone# , EMAIL = #email# , POSITIONNAME = #positionName# , DEPTNAME = #deptName# , USEYN = #useYn# , UPDATEBY = #loginId# , UPDATEON = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') WHERE USERID = #userId#
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIRM02 SET PASSWORD = #password# , LOGINFAILCOUNT = 0 , UPDATEBY = #loginId# , UPDATEON = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') WHERE USERID = #userId#

SELECT R05.ROLEID ROLEID , R05.ROLENAME ROLENAME , R05.ROLEDESC ROLEDESC , decode(R04.ROLEID,null,'false','true') CHK FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM05 R05 LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIRM04 R04 ON ( R05.ROLEID = R04.ROLEID AND R04.USERID = #userId# ) WHERE R05.UseYn ='Y'
